name: MATCH-ONE
description:
A simple but fun casual game where you have to match the 3 sphere set with emerging sphere pattern.

Controls:

Press any key to start.

Press 4, 5  and 6 to move black sphere to left, centre and right.

Gameplay:

Match the sphere set with coming sphere pattern by moving the black sphere left,centre, and  right .

Speed of the coming spheres will increase as the game progress so act quickly.
